ratings.comment: Alex was great! I had him for an early morning class and it was honestly bearable because of him and our small class size. The way content was approached in class made it super easy to learn and engage with the material, and Alex was always available for any questions or concerns we had, either during class or after.

Mr. Lara is an excellent teacher! He is super kind and cares a lot about his students success. He's also very charismatic, funny, and entertaining. As a native speaker I found this class to be helpful and insightful. Work load is not bad at all, study for the exams and you will do well, do your assignments and you will do well. TAKE THIS CLASS!!!!!

Highly recommended!! Absolutely a good teacher. Professor Alex Lara cared about his students' success. The grammar was explained very clearly and detailed in his classes. I would definitely take his class again if he teaches higher level Spanish in the future!

Very clear expectations and straightforward assignments and tests. Participation is part of your grade but as long as you show up to class and answer when you are called on you'll be fine. Really funny teacher and cared about student success. 100% would recommend.
